text: A referendum on the abolition of the defense opt-out, one of the country's opt-outs from the European Union, was held in Denmark on 1 June 2022. The referendum was announced on 6 March 2022 after a defense agreement reached during the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. The yes side won the referendum, winning two thirds of the vote. ==Notes== ==References== Category:June 2022 events Category:2022 in Europe Category:2022 in Denmark Category:Referendums
title: 2022 Danish European Union opt-out referendum
